text: Isacio Calleja García (6 December 1936 – 4 February 2019) was a Spanish footballer. He was born in Valle de Cerrato, Spain. He played as a defender. Calleja played for Atlético Madrid from 1958 to 1972 and for the national team from 1961 to 1972. Calleja died in Madrid on 4 February 2019 at the age of 82.Muere Isacio Calleja, una de las grandes leyendas del Atlético de Madrid ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Spanish footballers
title: Isacio Calleja
